title: Lesson 10 - One Minute Norwegian
description: In lesson 10 of One Minute Norwegian you will learn a few useful phrases which all learners want to learn. This week's lesson has been brought forward in time to allow learners wish Norwegian speakers 'Gratulerer med dagen' on 17th May, Norway's National Day. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Norwegian at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Norwegian is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
